name: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre
address: Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre, 2290 Cambie St, Vancouver, BC V5Z 2T7

featured_reviews.review_id:
We had a battery replaced but were not informed of the total cost until we returned for pickup. I argued over the labour charge and they provided a discount on the bill.

The work appears professional and I would go back without hesitation however get the full price upfront for a job like this with specific labour costs so you don't receive an unwelcomed surprise.
featured_reviews.review_text:
We had a battery replaced but were not informed of the total cost until we returned for pickup. I argued over the labour charge and they provided a discount on the bill.

The work appears professional and I would go back without hesitation however get the full price upfront for a job like this with specific labour costs so you don't receive an unwelcomed surprise.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can't thank the shop enough. My daughter lives in Vancouver and I called on her behalf and the shop was able to help her out with same-day service. My daughter is a person with a disability, so her vehicle is very important to her as accessible transportation is not always available. The shop was very understanding, very responsive and very helpful. Would definitely go back!  Special thanks to Alex for the exceptional above and beyond service!
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can't thank the shop enough. My daughter lives in Vancouver and I called on her behalf and the shop was able to help her out with same-day service. My daughter is a person with a disability, so her vehicle is very important to her as accessible transportation is not always available. The shop was very understanding, very responsive and very helpful. Would definitely go back!  Special thanks to Alex for the exceptional above and beyond service!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt feedback! We're truly humbled to hear about your positive experience with our service. Ensuring that all our customers feel heard and cared for is our top priority. It's reassuring to know that Alex could provide the exceptional service that we always strive for, especially in situations that matter most.

You and your daughter's trust in our service means a lot, and we're always here to assist with any future needs. Please don't hesitate to reach out anytime!

Warm regards,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: I gave my flat tire for repair last night.  I was told that it would be ready by 11AM the next day & will get a call from the shop. Next day I waited until 2:30Pm & went to the Auto shop. To my surprise, they mixed up my tire & hadn't even started working on it. I had to wait for more than an hour & wasted my time. Unprofessional behaviour.
featured_reviews.review_text: I gave my flat tire for repair last night.  I was told that it would be ready by 11AM the next day & will get a call from the shop. Next day I waited until 2:30Pm & went to the Auto shop. To my surprise, they mixed up my tire & hadn't even started working on it. I had to wait for more than an hour & wasted my time. Unprofessional behaviour.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Surjeet Singh,

Firstly, I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and oversight on our part. It's clear that we fell short in providing the service standard we aim for. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and I assure you that we will address this internally to help prevent such mistakes in the future. If there's anything else we can assist you with or if you'd like to discuss further, please feel free to reach out directly to me.

Thank you for your feedback. It helps us improve.

Kind regards,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id:
They just didn't seem to understand anything I told them, that's why the one star review.
I wanted to buy tires that where bigger, and I thought that Alex took my order right, but he just order the stock ones even though I wanted another size, and they didn't allow me to buy them even though I wasn't putting the tires with them, but Alex just didn't understand that! Just wanted to purchase the tires and I would install them somewhere else.
Also on our first conversation I thought I also purchased alignment, but he didn't put it in the bill. Arrange an appointment to get the alignment done, and when I come to do it, they told me the other person that took my appointment, set it as wheel balancing... which I already did with the company that put my tires(bought at Canadian tire) so I just needed the alignment, when I came for the alignment Alex told me it wouldn't be possible at the time and ask if I wanted to reschedule! I was so done at this point that I will never buy from the Cambie location ever again!
featured_reviews.review_text:
They just didn't seem to understand anything I told them, that's why the one star review.
I wanted to buy tires that where bigger, and I thought that Alex took my order right, but he just order the stock ones even though I wanted another size, and they didn't allow me to buy them even though I wasn't putting the tires with them, but Alex just didn't understand that! Just wanted to purchase the tires and I would install them somewhere else.
Also on our first conversation I thought I also purchased alignment, but he didn't put it in the bill. Arrange an appointment to get the alignment done, and when I come to do it, they told me the other person that took my appointment, set it as wheel balancing... which I already did with the company that put my tires(bought at Canadian tire) so I just needed the alignment, when I came for the alignment Alex told me it wouldn't be possible at the time and ask if I wanted to reschedule! I was so done at this point that I will never buy from the Cambie location ever again!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Ivan,

I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience at our Cambie location. We aim to provide accurate and top-notch service, and it seems we've missed the mark during your visit.

I understand that there was a misunderstanding regarding the tire size and alignment service you requested. Please rest assured that this feedback will be taken seriously and addressed with our team to avoid such miscommunication in the future.

If you're open to it, I would like to discuss this matter further to better understand where the miscommunication occurred, and how we can improve. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 604-707-2291.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and I hope we have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: Loyal customer here. Keep coming back here to get My Auto done. Great job to all the staff most of all GENESIS, JOEY and Kevin who always give the best excellent service and being helpful to us. Thank you all for doing all your best. Kudos to all.
featured_reviews.review_text: Loyal customer here. Keep coming back here to get My Auto done. Great job to all the staff most of all GENESIS, JOEY and Kevin who always give the best excellent service and being helpful to us. Thank you all for doing all your best. Kudos to all.

featured_reviews.review_id: Effective and efficient service from Canadian Tire! They were timely and communicative with what was happening. In particular, Justin at the front desk was SO helpful! He was the only consistent employee at the desk and helped incoming customers as well as writing up reports and checking in with the service team. He was polite, professional, and so helpful!! I really, really appreciate him!
featured_reviews.review_text: Effective and efficient service from Canadian Tire! They were timely and communicative with what was happening. In particular, Justin at the front desk was SO helpful! He was the only consistent employee at the desk and helped incoming customers as well as writing up reports and checking in with the service team. He was polite, professional, and so helpful!! I really, really appreciate him!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Sam,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! We're thrilled to hear about the effective and efficient service you received.

Justin is indeed an invaluable member of our team and we're delighted to hear about the exceptional service he provided. We'll be sure to share your kind words with him - he'll surely appreciate it!

Thank you for choosing Canadian Tire for your automotive needs. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

Best Regards,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: Went in for brake job that was done poorly Got car back with a leak. No issues before the brake job. Brought it back and was charged to get leak fixed. They told me it was a hose. Leak was not fixed in hose.
featured_reviews.review_text: Went in for brake job that was done poorly Got car back with a leak. No issues before the brake job. Brought it back and was charged to get leak fixed. They told me it was a hose. Leak was not fixed in hose.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello,

Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent experience at our shop. I am truly sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with the brake job and subsequent service you received, and I am here to assist you in resolving this issue.

Upon reviewing our records, I could not find any recent history of the service you are referring to in your review. The last record on file is from over two years ago. During that service, there were no charges for fixing a power steering leak. Instead,  we charged $39.99 for an inspection, and the rest of the services were performed at no charge. This included cleaning the power steering lines and reservoir, finding a leak from a loose clamp, tightening it, and asking to monitor the situation as no further leaks were noticed at that time.

If this is not the work order you are referencing in your review, could you please reach out to us and provide more details on the specific concerns you have? We want to ensure that we address the right issue and take the necessary steps to make things right.

We value your business and are committed to addressing your concerns to ensure your satisfaction.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Shan,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! I've passed this on to the both of them, and they truly appreciated your kind words. We hope you have a wonderful weekend, and a safe trip home.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
604-707-2291
